org.jcvlib.core

Class Color

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jcvlib.core.Color

  • public class Color
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains all color values of some pixel.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MAX_VALUE
      Bounds of color value -- maximum value.
      static int MIN_VALUE
      Bounds of color values -- minimum value.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Color(int numOfChannels)
      Create empty color.
      Color(int[] colorValues)
      Create empty color and initialize it by given float-point color values (from interval [0.0, 1.0]).
      Color(int numOfChannels, int value)
      Create empty color and initialize all channels by given integer value (from interval 0..255).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object object)
      Return true if current color equivalent to object from parameter and false otherwise.
      double euclidDist(Color c)
      Calculate normalize (all values between MIN_VALUE and MAX_VALUE) Euclidean distance between 2 colors.
      void fill(int value)
      Fill all channels by given value.
      int get(int channel)
      Return value (from interval [0.0, 255.0]) of color from given channel number.
      int getNumOfChannels()
      Return number channels of current color.
      static byte IntToUByte(int value)
      Convert int to unsigned byte.
      Color makeCopy()
      Return copy of current color.
      void set(int channel, int value)
      Set value (from interval [0.0, 255.0]) of color to given channel number.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Return string with values of this channel.
      static int UByteToInt(byte value)
      Convert unsigned byte to int.

        clone, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

        public double euclidDist(Color c)
        Calculate normalize (all values between MIN_VALUE and MAX_VALUE) Euclidean distance between 2 colors.

        Links:
        1. Euclidean distance -- Wikipedia.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object object)
        Return true if current color equivalent to object from parameter and false otherwise.

        Uses JCV.PRECISION by default.

        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object

      • makeCopy

        public Color makeCopy()
        Return copy of current color.

        It will be a REAL COPY of current color!

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Return string with values of this channel.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • IntToUByte

        public static byte IntToUByte(int value)
        Convert int to unsigned byte.

        If value less 0 or great than 255 it will be truncated to corresponded correct value. For example value -1 will be replaced to 0, value 256 will be replaced to 255.

      • UByteToInt

        public static int UByteToInt(byte value)
        Convert unsigned byte to int.
